unit_description_short_texts.text: placeholder

text.last_approved_text: This Sorcerer Lord can reach into the very minds of his adversaries, ripping thoughts apart as easily as undoing a knot.

unit_description_short_texts.text: This Sorcerer Lord can reach into the very minds of his adversaries, ripping thoughts apart as easily as undoing a knot.

text.last_approved_text: This Chaos Sorcerer employs dark and nefarious magics to tear through both body and mind.

unit_description_short_texts.text: This Chaos Sorcerer employs dark and nefarious magics to tear through both body and mind.

text.last_approved_text: In battle is the only time a Dragon Ogre can die, so they fight with a powerful fury.

unit_description_short_texts.text: In battle is the only time a Dragon Ogre can die, so they fight with a powerful fury.

text.last_approved_text: The Shaggoth tower over the common man, casting fearsome shadows matched only by the seismic devastation they cause.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Shaggoth tower over the common man, casting fearsome shadows matched only by the seismic devastation they cause.

text.last_approved_text: Little humanity remains within the Forsaken, only a desire for battle, followed by a furious charge into the fray.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Little humanity remains within the Forsaken, only a desire for battle, followed by a furious charge into the fray.

text.last_approved_text: Those who are not gored by the rolling spikes of this beast chariot are thrown to a clumsy, painful demise.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Those who are not gored by the rolling spikes of this beast chariot are thrown to a clumsy, painful demise.

text.last_approved_text: Kholek Suneater is beyond all mortal reckoning. His fury and strength, like his age, are immense. Truly, he is unstoppable.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Kholek Suneater is beyond all mortal reckoning. His fury and strength, like his age, are immense. Truly, he is unstoppable.

text.last_approved_text: A Lord of Change is imbued with the power of Tzeentch, able to sow madness and ruination amongst his foes.

unit_description_short_texts.text: A Lord of Change is imbued with the power of Tzeentch, able to sow madness and ruination amongst his foes.

text.last_approved_text: Spoken of for many ages, this Lord of Change is favoured by Tzeentch himself, and fulfils his dark, malicious purpose.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Spoken of for many ages, this Lord of Change is favoured by Tzeentch himself, and fulfils his dark, malicious purpose.

text.last_approved_text: Unblemished, frozen in time, pristine - the skin-deep appearance of Sigvald belies a twisted, corrupted, vicious soul, hungry for destruction.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Unblemished, frozen in time, pristine - the skin-deep appearance of Sigvald belies a twisted, corrupted, vicious soul, hungry for destruction.

text.last_approved_text: This Sorcerer Lord gleans his power from death itself, consigning his opponents to endless, tormented oblivion.

unit_description_short_texts.text: This Sorcerer Lord gleans his power from death itself, consigning his opponents to endless, tormented oblivion.

text.last_approved_text: The powerful Sorcerer Lord summons up pillars of flame that sear the enemy to their very core.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The powerful Sorcerer Lord summons up pillars of flame that sear the enemy to their very core.

text.last_approved_text: When subjected to his power, all before this Sorcerer Lord are sliced, diced and desiccated .

unit_description_short_texts.text: When subjected to his power, all before this Sorcerer Lord are sliced, diced and desiccated .

text.last_approved_text: The Flag of the Blood Keep flashes violently; the Blood Knights run their enemies down.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Flag of the Blood Keep flashes violently; the Blood Knights run their enemies down.

text.last_approved_text: The Amber Wizard commands the Lore of Beasts, ranging the forces of nature itself against the enemy.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Amber Wizard commands the Lore of Beasts, ranging the forces of nature itself against the enemy.

text.last_approved_text: Boris Todbringer is a man of singular action and determined purpose: to rid the forest of Khazrak's bestial scourge.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Boris Todbringer is a man of singular action and determined purpose: to rid the forest of Khazrak's bestial scourge.

text.last_approved_text: Savage masters of the battlefield, Beastlords join the fray with axes in hand and death in mind.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Savage masters of the battlefield, Beastlords join the fray with axes in hand and death in mind.

text.last_approved_text: The strongest, meanest Beastmen, Bestigors seek out elite foes to slaughter and dominate.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The strongest, meanest Beastmen, Bestigors seek out elite foes to slaughter and dominate.

text.last_approved_text: Cloaked in the power of the beast, the Bray-Shaman uses his primal mutations to exert greater strength.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Cloaked in the power of the beast, the Bray-Shaman uses his primal mutations to exert greater strength.

text.last_approved_text: Death whispers to the Bray-Shaman, who speaks the words to his enemies with hideous, incorporeal power.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Death whispers to the Bray-Shaman, who speaks the words to his enemies with hideous, incorporeal power.

text.last_approved_text: Darkness marches before the Bray-Shaman, deceiving and destroying all in its path.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Darkness marches before the Bray-Shaman, deceiving and destroying all in its path.

text.last_approved_text: The earth speaks and the Bray-Shaman hears it. Nature flows through him, giving him mastery over the land itself.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The earth speaks and the Bray-Shaman hears it. Nature flows through him, giving him mastery over the land itself.

text.last_approved_text: Hybrid man-beasts, raging at fate, Centigors bring their anger to bear upon anything in their path.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Hybrid man-beasts, raging at fate, Centigors bring their anger to bear upon anything in their path.

text.last_approved_text: A Centigor charges the enemy battle line, great weapon in hand, delivering oblivion to its foes.

unit_description_short_texts.text: A Centigor charges the enemy battle line, great weapon in hand, delivering oblivion to its foes.

text.last_approved_text: Though clumsy, Centigors can still lodge a throwing axe deep into an enemy skull from afar.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Though clumsy, Centigors can still lodge a throwing axe deep into an enemy skull from afar.

text.last_approved_text: An eldritch horror, the mad thrashing of its unnatural limbs sends all to their doom.

unit_description_short_texts.text: An eldritch horror, the mad thrashing of its unnatural limbs sends all to their doom.

text.last_approved_text: A pack of Chaos Warhounds charging, full of bloodlust and with jaws wide, creates no purer sense of terror.

unit_description_short_texts.text: A pack of Chaos Warhounds charging, full of bloodlust and with jaws wide, creates no purer sense of terror.

text.last_approved_text: This beast's bite brings not just pain, but also a cruel toxicity that courses through every vein.

unit_description_short_texts.text: This beast's bite brings not just pain, but also a cruel toxicity that courses through every vein.

text.last_approved_text: Plagued by visions, Cygors are cursed to see the Winds of Chaos. Naturally, this makes them mad and extremely dangerous.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Plagued by visions, Cygors are cursed to see the Winds of Chaos. Naturally, this makes them mad and extremely dangerous.

text.last_approved_text: The Manticore is a killer, above all. Born of Chaos, mutations and madness, but a killer all the same.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Manticore is a killer, above all. Born of Chaos, mutations and madness, but a killer all the same.

text.last_approved_text: Giants attack the enemy in a rage, with flailing limbs that break both man and machine apart.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Giants attack the enemy in a rage, with flailing limbs that break both man and machine apart.

text.last_approved_text: Gors may be rank-and-file beasts, but that does not diminish their ferocity on the battlefield.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Gors may be rank-and-file beasts, but that does not diminish their ferocity on the battlefield.

text.last_approved_text: With a weapon in each hand, these Gors lunge and slash at anything before them with predictably wild abandon.

unit_description_short_texts.text: With a weapon in each hand, these Gors lunge and slash at anything before them with predictably wild abandon.

text.last_approved_text: Gorebulls do not hesitate, smashing into enemy ranks with overwhelming power.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Gorebulls do not hesitate, smashing into enemy ranks with overwhelming power.

text.last_approved_text: More than a savage and destructive beast, Khazrak has a keen mind for strategy combined with animal cunning and guile.

unit_description_short_texts.text: More than a savage and destructive beast, Khazrak has a keen mind for strategy combined with animal cunning and guile.

text.last_approved_text: Where the Crowfather treads, mayhem and destruction always follow close behind.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Where the Crowfather treads, mayhem and destruction always follow close behind.

text.last_approved_text: A ferocious hunger drives axe-wielding Minotaurs into the melee - hunger for war and hunger for flesh.

unit_description_short_texts.text: A ferocious hunger drives axe-wielding Minotaurs into the melee - hunger for war and hunger for flesh.

text.last_approved_text: A Minotaur, with axe in hand, can hold its own against dozens of enemies with vicious, brutal fury.

unit_description_short_texts.text: A Minotaur, with axe in hand, can hold its own against dozens of enemies with vicious, brutal fury.

text.last_approved_text: The victims of a Minotaur are ripped limb from limb and then, unfortunately, devoured.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The victims of a Minotaur are ripped limb from limb and then, unfortunately, devoured.

text.last_approved_text: Though temperamental, a successful Razorgor Chariot charge causes horrendous damage to the enemy line.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Though temperamental, a successful Razorgor Chariot charge causes horrendous damage to the enemy line.

text.last_approved_text: Hideously mutated and filled with hungry rage, Razorgors tear men apart in their search for food.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Hideously mutated and filled with hungry rage, Razorgors tear men apart in their search for food.

text.last_approved_text: Though mocked by stronger beasts, Ungors nevertheless instil fear as they charge the foe down.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Though mocked by stronger beasts, Ungors nevertheless instil fear as they charge the foe down.

text.last_approved_text: Although diminutive by Beastmen standards, Ungors are both faster and more nimble than others of their kind.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Although diminutive by Beastmen standards, Ungors are both faster and more nimble than others of their kind.

text.last_approved_text: Ungors are more nimble than their brethren, useful for flanking foes and harassing with spears.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Ungors are more nimble than their brethren, useful for flanking foes and harassing with spears.

text.last_approved_text: With shields in hand, these Ungors can engage the enemy and hold their own thereafter.

unit_description_short_texts.text: With shields in hand, these Ungors can engage the enemy and hold their own thereafter.

text.last_approved_text: His is the grim, unending task of uprooting and shattering evil in all its forms.

unit_description_short_texts.text: His is the grim, unending task of uprooting and shattering evil in all its forms.

text.last_approved_text: Wading into battle, crazed and unable to be broken, facing their doom with furious acceptance.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Wading into battle, crazed and unable to be broken, facing their doom with furious acceptance.

text.last_approved_text: These men did not ask for war, yet it has come all the same. With sword in hand, they fight because they must.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These men did not ask for war, yet it has come all the same. With sword in hand, they fight because they must.

text.last_approved_text: The Hammer of the Witches, fired with righteous purpose, smites evil with thunderous, armour-shattering blasts.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Hammer of the Witches, fired with righteous purpose, smites evil with thunderous, armour-shattering blasts.

text.last_approved_text: Well-armoured and resplendent, the Knights deliver a fierce and destructive charge.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Well-armoured and resplendent, the Knights deliver a fierce and destructive charge.

text.last_approved_text: Majesty and power personified, their devastating charge exemplifying their regal brilliance.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Majesty and power personified, their devastating charge exemplifying their regal brilliance.

text.last_approved_text: The heart of any battle and the embodiment of Sigmar's will as they heroically engage the foe.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The heart of any battle and the embodiment of Sigmar's will as they heroically engage the foe.

text.last_approved_text: With a thunderous roll, a volley of devastating, armour-piercing fire is loosed.

unit_description_short_texts.text: With a thunderous roll, a volley of devastating, armour-piercing fire is loosed.

text.last_approved_text: Some are drawn to war by the need for vengeance, fighting fiercely to sate their bloodlust.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Some are drawn to war by the need for vengeance, fighting fiercely to sate their bloodlust.

text.last_approved_text: Its destructive power cannot be overstated, the world illuminated by a turbulent battery of missile fire.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Its destructive power cannot be overstated, the world illuminated by a turbulent battery of missile fire.

text.last_approved_text: They thrive in melee, with the unbreakable spirit that comes from accepting death.

unit_description_short_texts.text: They thrive in melee, with the unbreakable spirit that comes from accepting death.

text.last_approved_text: The Wind is stored and harnessed, resulting in the bursting forth of a lethal energy.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Wind is stored and harnessed, resulting in the bursting forth of a lethal energy.

text.last_approved_text: "Everything about him is bent to that one great task of holding back evil."

unit_description_short_texts.text: "Everything about him is bent to that one great task of holding back evil."

text.last_approved_text: Above their peers, Zintler's men charge down enemy lines with a destructive fury that makes the earth shake.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Above their peers, Zintler's men charge down enemy lines with a destructive fury that makes the earth shake.

text.last_approved_text: A semi-spectral force that severs mortal souls from their corporeal hosts.

unit_description_short_texts.text: A semi-spectral force that severs mortal souls from their corporeal hosts.

text.last_approved_text: Unspeakable evil energy is exuded, both empowering the Undead legions and crippling those who stand against them.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Unspeakable evil energy is exuded, both empowering the Undead legions and crippling those who stand against them.

text.last_approved_text: Devilish chariots imbued with dark and eldritch power, driving the Undead to greater, more macabre acts.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Devilish chariots imbued with dark and eldritch power, driving the Undead to greater, more macabre acts.

text.last_approved_text: Infernal flames belch from dismal braziers, permeating the air with fragments of magic-confounding warpstone.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Infernal flames belch from dismal braziers, permeating the air with fragments of magic-confounding warpstone.

text.last_approved_text: When the lodestone bell rings, dark magic exudes and ripples across the battlefield.

unit_description_short_texts.text: When the lodestone bell rings, dark magic exudes and ripples across the battlefield.

text.last_approved_text: No longer Vampires, but fighting with the same insane savagery.

unit_description_short_texts.text: No longer Vampires, but fighting with the same insane savagery.

text.last_approved_text: Hurling itself into the fray, the pack's teeth close around limbs and do not let go.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Hurling itself into the fray, the pack's teeth close around limbs and do not let go.

text.last_approved_text: These ghouls remember one thing - war - and they pursue that goal with single-minded savagery.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These ghouls remember one thing - war - and they pursue that goal with single-minded savagery.

text.last_approved_text: "What is death but an obstacle to be overcome? There is no true death beneath the eternal night."

unit_description_short_texts.text: "What is death but an obstacle to be overcome? There is no true death beneath the eternal night."

text.last_approved_text: Though most Undead are no more than stumbling thralls, these warriors have achieved renown due to their effectiveness in melee.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Though most Undead are no more than stumbling thralls, these warriors have achieved renown due to their effectiveness in melee.

text.last_approved_text: Bolstering the fighting spirit of all those around it and blasting enemy ranks with savage, dark energy.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Bolstering the fighting spirit of all those around it and blasting enemy ranks with savage, dark energy.

text.last_approved_text: Only the most basic memory survives: to fight, and better than their other Undead cohorts.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Only the most basic memory survives: to fight, and better than their other Undead cohorts.

text.last_approved_text: Though deformed and reduced by time, they remain savage warriors and masters of the dead.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Though deformed and reduced by time, they remain savage warriors and masters of the dead.

text.last_approved_text: Zombies: shuffling, mindless, ambling towards their foes - on an unending quest for flesh.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Zombies: shuffling, mindless, ambling towards their foes - on an unending quest for flesh.

text.last_approved_text: From atop skeletal mounts, death and destruction are dealt without contrition.

unit_description_short_texts.text: From atop skeletal mounts, death and destruction are dealt without contrition.

text.last_approved_text: Through life, death, and Undeath, the first and greatest of the Vampire Counts pursues the throne; it is his by right!

unit_description_short_texts.text: Through life, death, and Undeath, the first and greatest of the Vampire Counts pursues the throne; it is his by right!

text.last_approved_text: Victims find out too late that the enchanting creature gliding towards them is not a woman, but a savage, rabid beast!

unit_description_short_texts.text: Victims find out too late that the enchanting creature gliding towards them is not a woman, but a savage, rabid beast!

text.last_approved_text: Morghur does not care for the world as it is, preferring to remake it according to his ever-changing whims.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Morghur does not care for the world as it is, preferring to remake it according to his ever-changing whims.

text.last_approved_text: It is best not to speak ill of the Grey, for they are everywhere and nowhere all at once.

unit_description_short_texts.text: It is best not to speak ill of the Grey, for they are everywhere and nowhere all at once.

text.last_approved_text: Acolytes of the green Wind of Magic use the natural world and its seasons to heal and protect their companions.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Acolytes of the green Wind of Magic use the natural world and its seasons to heal and protect their companions.

text.last_approved_text: “’Good’? I spit on ‘good’! I desire only power, and you watch, for I shall have it!”

unit_description_short_texts.text: “’Good’? I spit on ‘good’! I desire only power, and you watch, for I shall have it!”

text.last_approved_text: Before the Elves there were the Ancients. If woken from their slumber, it is always to defend the forest.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Before the Elves there were the Ancients. If woken from their slumber, it is always to defend the forest.

text.last_approved_text: The handmaidens of the Ancients protect their former kingdom from harm, all the while plotting against its usurpers…

unit_description_short_texts.text: The handmaidens of the Ancients protect their former kingdom from harm, all the while plotting against its usurpers…

text.last_approved_text: Surprise is the greatest of weapons, enabling the stealthy to strike first and hardest, and tip the odds in their favour.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Surprise is the greatest of weapons, enabling the stealthy to strike first and hardest, and tip the odds in their favour.

text.last_approved_text: Imagine the foe’s surprise when, in addition to the unexpected attack, their opponents loose two deadly, enchanted arrows at a time!

unit_description_short_texts.text: Imagine the foe’s surprise when, in addition to the unexpected attack, their opponents loose two deadly, enchanted arrows at a time!

text.last_approved_text: There is no bargaining when the forest is damaged; vengeance will be exacted.

unit_description_short_texts.text: There is no bargaining when the forest is damaged; vengeance will be exacted.

text.last_approved_text: Even the wisest, most ancient of gentle spirits can be bent to violence by savage, unrelenting war.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Even the wisest, most ancient of gentle spirits can be bent to violence by savage, unrelenting war.

text.last_approved_text: Beneath the fortress of boughs, Athel Loren is defended with blood.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Beneath the fortress of boughs, Athel Loren is defended with blood.

text.last_approved_text: The spear and shield of the Wood Elves, seldom bested in combat.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The spear and shield of the Wood Elves, seldom bested in combat.

text.last_approved_text: These wise, winged bastions of the forest will see it defended, as they have done for countless centuries.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These wise, winged bastions of the forest will see it defended, as they have done for countless centuries.

text.last_approved_text: In many ways, these warriors define the armies of Athel Loren - their bows and blades are at the forefront of any action.

unit_description_short_texts.text: In many ways, these warriors define the armies of Athel Loren - their bows and blades are at the forefront of any action.

text.last_approved_text: Stalwarts of Athel Loren’s Elven armies, these bow and blade-armed warriors’ arrows burn with an enchanted flame to ignite flammable targets.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Stalwarts of Athel Loren’s Elven armies, these bow and blade-armed warriors’ arrows burn with an enchanted flame to ignite flammable targets.

text.last_approved_text: The definitive Wood Elf warriors within the armies of Athel Loren, bolstered by magical, poisoned arrow-tips for additional advantage.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The definitive Wood Elf warriors within the armies of Athel Loren, bolstered by magical, poisoned arrow-tips for additional advantage.

text.last_approved_text: Above pride, vanity and selfish ego there is only Athel Loren.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Above pride, vanity and selfish ego there is only Athel Loren.

text.last_approved_text: Agile and swift beyond measure, these mounted warriors' missiles spell doom for their opponents.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Agile and swift beyond measure, these mounted warriors' missiles spell doom for their opponents.

text.last_approved_text: Swift and deadly, these mounted archers use arrows dipped in poison and charged with magic to weaken and slow their targets.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Swift and deadly, these mounted archers use arrows dipped in poison and charged with magic to weaken and slow their targets.

text.last_approved_text: When the skies are dark and the need is great, these noble avians come to the aid of their Elven friends.

unit_description_short_texts.text: When the skies are dark and the need is great, these noble avians come to the aid of their Elven friends.

text.last_approved_text: The bond between the Elves and the Hawks is unbreakable.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The bond between the Elves and the Hawks is unbreakable.

text.last_approved_text: Orion is the Wood Elves; he is the Winds; he is Athel Loren itself.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Orion is the Wood Elves; he is the Winds; he is Athel Loren itself.

text.last_approved_text: Ariel's handmaidens know only the defence of their Queen and the forest - an eternal duty, never forsworn.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Ariel's handmaidens know only the defence of their Queen and the forest - an eternal duty, never forsworn.

text.last_approved_text: Whether casting supportive spells or waves of destruction, victory is carried by the song of spells.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Whether casting supportive spells or waves of destruction, victory is carried by the song of spells.

text.last_approved_text: The strongest of souls gather the forest around them and are reborn as instruments of its defence.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The strongest of souls gather the forest around them and are reborn as instruments of its defence.

text.last_approved_text: A powerful flurry of knots and branches, striking out in the midst of the battle; the will of the forest made real.

unit_description_short_texts.text: A powerful flurry of knots and branches, striking out in the midst of the battle; the will of the forest made real.

text.last_approved_text: Floating and weaving through the battle line; an expressive demonstration of violence.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Floating and weaving through the battle line; an expressive demonstration of violence.

text.last_approved_text: When deadly Asrai spears are wielded, the wardance is an intricate performance ending in the foes' death.

unit_description_short_texts.text: When deadly Asrai spears are wielded, the wardance is an intricate performance ending in the foes' death.

text.last_approved_text: Never missing the mark, one alone is a deadly, formidable opponent.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Never missing the mark, one alone is a deadly, formidable opponent.

text.last_approved_text: Those who enter Athel Loren without permission must answer for such a transgression.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Those who enter Athel Loren without permission must answer for such a transgression.

text.last_approved_text: Galloping to war with Orion, his personal guard bring a calamity to all who stand against them.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Galloping to war with Orion, his personal guard bring a calamity to all who stand against them.

text.last_approved_text: Galloping to war with Orion, his personal guard bring a calamity to all who stand against them.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Galloping to war with Orion, his personal guard bring a calamity to all who stand against them.

text.last_approved_text: Agile and deadly in melee - an excellent first-response to impending threats.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Agile and deadly in melee - an excellent first-response to impending threats.

text.last_approved_text: The path to Ruinous glory is strewn with the butchered remains of those who fell by the wayside.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The path to Ruinous glory is strewn with the butchered remains of those who fell by the wayside.

text.last_approved_text: Horse-born leaders, their powerful steeds a symbol of dread status before the Dark Gods.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Horse-born leaders, their powerful steeds a symbol of dread status before the Dark Gods.

text.last_approved_text: A burning desire for vengeance and justice drives Belegar Ironhammer - he will reclaim his throne, no matter the cost.

unit_description_short_texts.text: A burning desire for vengeance and justice drives Belegar Ironhammer - he will reclaim his throne, no matter the cost.

text.last_approved_text: More rudimentary than other Dwarf artillery, but nevertheless ruthlessly proficient at destroying their foes.

unit_description_short_texts.text: More rudimentary than other Dwarf artillery, but nevertheless ruthlessly proficient at destroying their foes.

text.last_approved_text: These Slayers seek the ultimate blood sport, the greatest beasts, in their unending death-drive.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These Slayers seek the ultimate blood sport, the greatest beasts, in their unending death-drive.

text.last_approved_text: The Miners of Mount Bloodhorn fight in memory of their fallen Hold with unmatched passion and fury.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Miners of Mount Bloodhorn fight in memory of their fallen Hold with unmatched passion and fury.

text.last_approved_text: When a grudge-writ rock is unavailable, live Goblin ammunition is just as good.

unit_description_short_texts.text: When a grudge-writ rock is unavailable, live Goblin ammunition is just as good.

text.last_approved_text: Sheer weight of numbers forced us back, against our best efforts to remain stalwart. That will not happen again. I vow it.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Sheer weight of numbers forced us back, against our best efforts to remain stalwart. That will not happen again. I vow it.

text.last_approved_text: Though they hail from Clan Norgrimling, the fealty of these Ironbreakers is sworn to the glory of the Dwarfs.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Though they hail from Clan Norgrimling, the fealty of these Ironbreakers is sworn to the glory of the Dwarfs.

text.last_approved_text: All Dwarfs complain, all Longbeards moan, but none gripe and fight half as much as these courageous old gits.

unit_description_short_texts.text: All Dwarfs complain, all Longbeards moan, but none gripe and fight half as much as these courageous old gits.

text.last_approved_text: All Karaks are defended with vigour, but none hold the line with as much determination as these hammer-wielding guards.

unit_description_short_texts.text: All Karaks are defended with vigour, but none hold the line with as much determination as these hammer-wielding guards.

text.last_approved_text: No cave is too dark, no pathway too treacherous for the Ranger to scout and scour and know.

unit_description_short_texts.text: No cave is too dark, no pathway too treacherous for the Ranger to scout and scour and know.

text.last_approved_text: Ever seeking vengeance, these hardy Rangers follow their Brewmaster, delivering grim tidings of upcoming struggles and bolstering the Dwarfs’ defensive lines.

text.last_approved_text: Stealthy and steadfast, these redoubtable Rangers carry both throwing and great axes – the latter for dealing with the more ‘imposing’ opponents.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Stealthy and steadfast, these redoubtable Rangers carry both throwing and great axes – the latter for dealing with the more ‘imposing’ opponents.

text.last_approved_text: The greatest of Runesmiths rides into battle atop the Anvil of Doom, smiting all foes with magical fury.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The greatest of Runesmiths rides into battle atop the Anvil of Doom, smiting all foes with magical fury.

text.last_approved_text: The Master Runesmith stands by his Lord – his kin – one last time before the gods.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Master Runesmith stands by his Lord – his kin – one last time before the gods.

text.last_approved_text: The Dwarfs of Clan Norgrimling are determined to see their enemies wiped out with a whoosh of scalding, cleansing steam.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Dwarfs of Clan Norgrimling are determined to see their enemies wiped out with a whoosh of scalding, cleansing steam.

text.last_approved_text: The mountains and caverns ring with Greenskin screams when these elite Gyrobombers unleash their payloads.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The mountains and caverns ring with Greenskin screams when these elite Gyrobombers unleash their payloads.

text.last_approved_text: Centuries of shame in defeat shall be washed away ‘neath my hammer; Clan Angrund will rise again!

unit_description_short_texts.text: Centuries of shame in defeat shall be washed away ‘neath my hammer; Clan Angrund will rise again!

text.last_approved_text: “No Troll, no Orc, no sneaky grobi scum shall bar my path. This time…”

unit_description_short_texts.text: “No Troll, no Orc, no sneaky grobi scum shall bar my path. This time…”

text.last_approved_text: Keen and sharp, these Dwarfs know every nook, every cranny of the mountains.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Keen and sharp, these Dwarfs know every nook, every cranny of the mountains.

text.last_approved_text: All are made or unmade in the crucible of Dragonfire Pass. So it is with these resolute, peerless Dwarf Warriors.

unit_description_short_texts.text: All are made or unmade in the crucible of Dragonfire Pass. So it is with these resolute, peerless Dwarf Warriors.

text.last_approved_text: The biggest, nastiest, most bad-tempered of Big 'Uns, this elite mob will stomp ya and jump about on da bitz afterwards.

text.last_approved_text: Anticipating the will of Skarsnik, this crack squad of Goblin nutters undertakes whatever devious chicanery is required to achieve victory.

text.last_approved_text: A piercing arrow is debilitating enough, yet all manner of filth and corrosion is loosed from their crude bows.

text.last_approved_text: A bunch of sneaky, venal, stabby gits - a suitably befitting bodyguard for the treacherous Warlord of the Eight Peaks.

text.last_approved_text: These arachnid aberrations make for powerful, terrifying mounts, bringing eight-legged death to their cowering foes.

text.last_approved_text: Riding a Squig is a dangerous, foolish business. Goblins, however, are better riders than most, so live slightly longer.

text.last_approved_text: These crude machines hurl rocks with such fury, their targets feel as if Gork himself was assaulting them.

unit_description_short_texts.text: These crude machines hurl rocks with such fury, their targets feel as if Gork himself was assaulting them.

text.last_approved_text: Armed to da teef and always ready for a scrap, this elite Black Orc regiment wear distinctive red armour.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Armed to da teef and always ready for a scrap, this elite Black Orc regiment wear distinctive red armour.

text.last_approved_text: Dishevelled and mange-ridden, these wolves (and their riders) are savage beasts all the same.

text.last_approved_text: With a pining cry to the great, weird moon, Morrslieb, these wolves carry their Goblin riders to war.

text.last_approved_text: Even the most heinous green-skinned scumbags look upon these Goblins' swift skulduggery with reverent horror.

text.last_approved_text: It takes a certain kind of insanity to ride a rage-frothed Squig and bounce into the fray.

text.last_approved_text: Although not as mighty as Orcs, Night Goblins nevertheless control their forces through fear and savage, macabre bloodlust.

text.last_approved_text: Pernicious and sly, Skarsnik retains command through deception, subterfuge and no small amount of murder.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Pernicious and sly, Skarsnik retains command through deception, subterfuge and no small amount of murder.

text.last_approved_text: Although a fraction of the size of their fully-grown sisters, newly-hatched Arachnaroks are every bit as deadly.

text.last_approved_text: After riding their enemies down, what grim prize these Goblins claim is their own dark, devilish business.

text.last_approved_text: Poisonous, corrosive venom dripping from her fearsome jaws, she first ensnares her victims in a web of dense, sticky silk.

text.last_approved_text: A hippogryph is no easy prize, but its power in battle makes the effort to tame one worth it.

text.last_approved_text: The rarest of all steeds, only the most noble of Bretonnians ride these dignified, sophisticated creatures into battle.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The rarest of all steeds, only the most noble of Bretonnians ride these dignified, sophisticated creatures into battle.

text.last_approved_text: As stern and determined as the endless ocean, and as savage as the rolling tempest.

text.last_approved_text: Although a fierce foe to Bretonnia's enemies, Knights should be wary of their kleptomaniac tendencies…

text.last_approved_text: The trebuchet - far superior to the catapult - hurls thrice-blessed stones at the enemy, crushing them with devout fury.

text.last_approved_text: Proponents of the Lore of Life protect and heal friendly troops and allies, whilst forestalling their foes at every turn.

text.last_approved_text: The Lore of Fire imbues Bright Wizards with the power to call searing fire and burning death upon those who oppose them.

text.last_approved_text: A Captain of the Empire is a Hero, a specialist in melee who leads by his courageous example.

unit_description_short_texts.text: A Captain of the Empire is a Hero, a specialist in melee who leads by his courageous example.

text.last_approved_text: Celestial Wizards draw strength from the Comet of Power, calling devastating heavenly magic to rend enemies asunder.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Celestial Wizards draw strength from the Comet of Power, calling devastating heavenly magic to rend enemies asunder.

text.last_approved_text: More stalwart and powerful than even the riders atop them, demigryphs deliver a monstrous charge into enemy battle lines.

unit_description_short_texts.text: More stalwart and powerful than even the riders atop them, demigryphs deliver a monstrous charge into enemy battle lines.

text.last_approved_text: The noble-born warriors of the Empire fight in Knightly Orders, heroic brotherhoods who ride into battle atop mighty barded warhorses.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The noble-born warriors of the Empire fight in Knightly Orders, heroic brotherhoods who ride into battle atop mighty barded warhorses.

text.last_approved_text: The Lord commander wades into battle, cutting foes apart and setting an example for the rest of the army.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Lord commander wades into battle, cutting foes apart and setting an example for the rest of the army.

text.last_approved_text: The Empire's standard, effective cannonry sends armour-piercing iron balls ploughing through enemy ranks with devastating aplomb.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Empire's standard, effective cannonry sends armour-piercing iron balls ploughing through enemy ranks with devastating aplomb.

text.last_approved_text: Wielding double-handed swords and wearing heavy plate, Greatswords are a potent elite unit with an impressive melee strength.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Wielding double-handed swords and wearing heavy plate, Greatswords are a potent elite unit with an impressive melee strength.

text.last_approved_text: Helblaster Guns eviscerate opposition from a distance with a ceaseless shower of black powder fire.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Helblaster Guns eviscerate opposition from a distance with a ceaseless shower of black powder fire.

text.last_approved_text: An erratic flurry of explosive airborne destruction - Helstorm rockets are extremely powerful, if extremely unreliable, weapons from the Empire's arsenal.

unit_description_short_texts.text: An erratic flurry of explosive airborne destruction - Helstorm rockets are extremely powerful, if extremely unreliable, weapons from the Empire's arsenal.

text.last_approved_text: "For the Empire! For Sigmar! For GLORY!"

unit_description_short_texts.text: "For the Empire! For Sigmar! For GLORY!"

text.last_approved_text: Light Wizards illuminate their foes with magic drawn from the Lore of Light, blazing and binding enemies with purifying brightness.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Light Wizards illuminate their foes with magic drawn from the Lore of Light, blazing and binding enemies with purifying brightness.

text.last_approved_text: A weapon from the College of Light, vaporising their enemies by channelling the Wind of Hysh.

unit_description_short_texts.text: A weapon from the College of Light, vaporising their enemies by channelling the Wind of Hysh.

text.last_approved_text: What a Mortar may lack in sheer stopping power compared to cannons, it makes up with pure vicious, explosive destruction.

unit_description_short_texts.text: What a Mortar may lack in sheer stopping power compared to cannons, it makes up with pure vicious, explosive destruction.

text.last_approved_text: Fast and dependable, an Outrider can be in one place to fire, then be in another to fire again moments later.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Fast and dependable, an Outrider can be in one place to fire, then be in another to fire again moments later.

text.last_approved_text: The Pistoliers are standard ranged cavalry, their pistols packing an effective punch whilst maintaining mobility.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Pistoliers are standard ranged cavalry, their pistols packing an effective punch whilst maintaining mobility.

text.last_approved_text: Equipped with the best armour and weapons, Reiksguard deliver a powerful charge, then remain amongst the throng to continue fighting.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Equipped with the best armour and weapons, Reiksguard deliver a powerful charge, then remain amongst the throng to continue fighting.

text.last_approved_text: The thudding crossbow bolts pack a punch that can bring down most foes.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The thudding crossbow bolts pack a punch that can bring down most foes.

text.last_approved_text: Halberdiers are stalwart defenders, able to hold the line behind a wall of Halberds, cutting enemies to ribbons.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Halberdiers are stalwart defenders, able to hold the line behind a wall of Halberds, cutting enemies to ribbons.

text.last_approved_text: Volleys of withering fire reduce any would-be army to a riddled, desperate band.

text.last_approved_text: Spearmen provide the backbone of the Empire's battle line, a defensive row of spears against the enemy charge.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Spearmen provide the backbone of the Empire's battle line, a defensive row of spears against the enemy charge.

text.last_approved_text: The Swordsmen form a resolute battle line. Blades in hand, they thrive in melee, at the heart of battle.

unit_description_short_texts.text: The Swordsmen form a resolute battle line. Blades in hand, they thrive in melee, at the heart of battle.

text.last_approved_text: From great range, a Steam Tank launches powerful shots of armour-piercing cannon fire with tremendous stopping power.

text.last_approved_text: These men wade into battle with conventional weapons, but can also call powerful magical forces to decimate their enemies.

text.last_approved_text: With pistol in hand and a furious desire to root out heresy, the Witch Hunter is a formidable fighter.

unit_description_short_texts.text: With pistol in hand and a furious desire to root out heresy, the Witch Hunter is a formidable fighter.

text.last_approved_text: With a team of Goblins upon its back, the Arachnarok's sheer enormity strikes fear into the hearts of all who face it.

text.last_approved_text: Nobody knows what the crown is or where it is from, but through it Azhag gains clairvoyance and power.

text.last_approved_text: Black Orcs are more disciplined, armoured and deadly than other Orcs, ripping through enemies with their heavy weapons for fun.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Black Orcs are more disciplined, armoured and deadly than other Orcs, ripping through enemies with their heavy weapons for fun.

text.last_approved_text: Fired from a catapult with crude wings strapped to his arms, the cackling Goblin pilot guides himself to a messy, pointy-hatted impact.

unit_description_short_texts.text: Though powerful enough in battle, a Goblin Boss can also employ all manner of trickery to ensure victory.

text.last_approved_text: A Great Shaman summons the power of Gork and Mork, ravaging any in his way.

text.last_approved_text: The spear is a solid weapon; piercing and defensive. Goblins, however…

text.last_approved_text: Fell Bats fall upon their enemies in a seething mass; in numbers, they become overwhelming.

text.last_approved_text: Stalwart defenders of the crypts, Grave Guards possess a fighting skill beyond that of the usual wights.

text.last_approved_text: "The dead answer my call. When you are dead, you will answer too!"

text.last_approved_text: Hexwraiths charge, spectral, through mountains in search of their prey - a battle line is a trifling thing for their devastating attack.

text.last_approved_text: Cunning, devious and powerful, Mannfred von Carstein sees all before him as prizes to be claimed.

text.last_approved_text: Drifting between the living and the dead, a Master Necromancer summons Undead minions to fight enemies on his behalf.

text.last_approved_text: Little more than shuffling bones with swords and spears, Skeletons perform a dutiful, if not exemplary, job in the battle lines.

text.last_approved_text: In amongst the fighting, a Vampire is a danger to her enemies, a vicious warrior and uncompromisingly cruel.

text.last_approved_text: Weapons bursting with dark energy, Wight Kings are monstrous fighters, more powerful than a dozen lesser ghouls.

text.last_approved_text: Driven not by skill, but by a desire to feast on flesh, Zombies are good, terrifying fodder in melee.

text.last_approved_text: The White Dwarf is a legendary figure - the mightiest living Dawi warrior.

text.last_approved_text: As wicked as she is learned, no mortal can harm the Unliving Countess of Sylvania, for she reigns eternal!
